page.description: Fires before the callback that occurs when a user tries to log out of the application. Return false to cancel the logout.

discussion.p: The *[ui:canLogout]* client-side event fires before the user is logged out of the system. You can abort the operation by returning false. For example:

argument.name: e
argument.description: An object with the following properties:

property.name: logoutSucceeded
property.description: A true or false value indicating whether or not the logout succeeded.
